summary.description: Automated Identification of Cell Types in Single Cell RNA Sequencing | Automated Cell Type Identification using Neural Networks | ACTINN (Automated Cell Type Identification using Neural Networks) is a bioinformatic tool to quickly and accurately identify cell types in scRNA-Seq. For details, please read the paper: https://academic.oup.com/bioinformatics/advance-article/doi/10.1093/bioinformatics/btz592/5540320 All datasets used in the paper are available here: https://figshare.com/articles/ACTINN/8967116
summary.name: ACTINN
